name: Claw Core
description: Terminal Runtime Layer with multi-bot Telegram setup, PicoClaw integration, direct Cursor Agent invocation, and Cursor agent workspace. Provides session-managed command execution, image generation via Cursor, Q&A via PicoClaw, shared_memory/shared_skills workspace, and a one-command 3-bot setup (artist, assistant, developer). Linux and macOS only.

binaryPath.description: Path to claw_core binary. If unset, uses claw_core from PATH or ~/.cargo/bin/claw_core.

sourcePath.description: Path to claw repo (to build from source). If set, daemon uses cargo run from this dir.

autoStart.description: Auto-start claw_core when OpenClaw gateway starts

picoClawPath.description: Path to PicoClaw binary. If unset, uses picoclaw from PATH.

cursorPath.description: Path to Cursor CLI binary. If unset, uses cursor from PATH.

cursorTimeout.description: Default timeout for Cursor Agent in seconds

defaultWorkspace.description: Default workspace path for Cursor and exec operations.

enablePicoClaw.description: Enable PicoClaw integration (picoclaw_chat and picoclaw_config tools)
